alert.note: Alert for Edmunds; McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:08PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Edmunds and central McPherson Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 407 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Leola to 10 miles northwest of Deerfield Colony to near Plainview Colony to near Ipswich. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Lake and New Town Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
